frontmatter.title: European Capitals of Culture as a space for connecting tourism, cultural heritage and creative industries

node.excerpt: About this webinar: The title of European Capital of Culture has become, in the last decade, a unique opportunity for small and medium size cities to valorise their cultural activities, their cultural heritage and local creative scenes by also…
